crystal_longsword.name: Crystal Longsword
crystal_longsword.description: 3 charges, regains 1d3 daily at dawn. Expend 1 charge to regain HP equal to extra radiant damage dealt.

light.name: Light
light.description: Touch object to shed bright light in 20-foot radius

protection_from_evil_and_good.name: Protection from Evil and Good
protection_from_evil_and_good.description: Protects against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Ward creature against attack, attackers must make Wisdom save

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: 3 creatures add 1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws

heroism.name: Heroism
heroism.description: Target is immune to frightened and gains 5 temporary HP at the start of each of its turns

lesser_restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
lesser_restoration.description: End one disease or condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned)

aid.name: Aid
aid.description: Up to 3 creatures gain 5 temporary HP and increase HP maximum

find_steed.name: Find Steed
find_steed.description: Summon celestial, fey, or fiend spirit as mount

prayer_of_healing.name: Prayer of Healing
prayer_of_healing.description: Up to 6 creatures regain 2d8 + CHA modifier HP

dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
dispel_magic.description: End spells of 3rd level or lower, roll for higher level spells

beacon_of_hope.name: Beacon of Hope
beacon_of_hope.description: Creatures have advantage on Wisdom saves and death saves, regain max HP from healing

revivify.name: Revivify
revivify.description: Return creature to life that died within last minute

aura_of_vitality.name: Aura of Vitality
aura_of_vitality.description: Bonus action to heal 2d6 HP to creature in aura

magic_circle.name: Magic Circle
magic_circle.description: 10-foot cylinder protects against celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead

remove_curse.name: Remove Curse
remove_curse.description: End all curses on creature or object

crusaders_mantle.name: Crusader's Mantle
crusaders_mantle.description: Allies within 30 feet deal +1d4 radiant damage on weapon attacks

aura_of_life.name: Aura of Life
aura_of_life.description: Resistance to necrotic damage, allies at 0 HP regain 1 HP at start of turn

guardian_of_faith.name: Guardian of Faith
guardian_of_faith.description: Spectral guardian deals 20 radiant damage to enemies that approach

death_ward.name: Death Ward
death_ward.description: First time target would drop to 0 HP, they instead drop to 1 HP. Spell ends after preventing death once.

sacred_weapon.name: Sacred Weapon
sacred_weapon.description: +5 to attack rolls, weapon sheds light, 1 minute duration

turn_the_unholy.name: Turn the Unholy
turn_the_unholy.description: Fiends and undead within 30ft must make Wisdom save (DC 18) or be turned

lay_on_hands.name: Lay on Hands
lay_on_hands.description: Heal HP or cure disease/poison (5 HP per disease/poison)

divine_sense.name: Divine Sense
divine_sense.description: Detect celestials, fiends, undead within 60ft as action

radiant_soul.name: Radiant Soul
radiant_soul.description: Bonus action: gain 30ft fly speed, +4 radiant damage once per turn

aura_of_protection.name: Aura of Protection
aura_of_protection.description: +5 to saving throws for you and allies within 10ft

aura_of_courage.name: Aura of Courage
aura_of_courage.description: You and allies within 10ft can't be frightened

aura_of_devotion.name: Aura of Devotion
aura_of_devotion.description: You and allies within 10ft can't be charmed

divine_smite.name: Divine Smite
divine_smite.description: Expend spell slot for +2d8 to 5d8 radiant damage on melee hit

improved_divine_smite.name: Improved Divine Smite
improved_divine_smite.description: All melee weapon hits deal +1d8 radiant damage

cleansing_touch.name: Cleansing Touch
cleansing_touch.description: End one spell on yourself or a willing creature you touch. Uses equal to Charisma modifier (minimum 1).

plate_armor_plus_2.name: Plate Armor +2
plate_armor_plus_2.description: Enchanted plate armor providing AC 19 (base 18 + 2 enhancement). Worn.

sentinel_shield.name: Sentinel Shield
sentinel_shield.description: Magical shield providing +2 AC. Grants advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks. Worn.

crystal_longsword.name: Crystal Longsword
crystal_longsword.description: Magical longsword dealing 1d8+3 slashing + 1d8 radiant damage. Has 3 charges (regains 1d3 at dawn). Expend 1 charge to regain HP equal to radiant damage dealt. Equipped.

ring_of_cold_resistance.name: Ring of Cold Resistance
ring_of_cold_resistance.description: Grants resistance to cold damage. Worn and attuned.

periapt_of_wound_closure.name: Periapt of Wound Closure
periapt_of_wound_closure.description: Stabilizes you automatically at 0 HP. Doubles HP recovered from Hit Dice. Worn and attuned.

holy_symbol_pelor.name: Holy Symbol of Pelor
holy_symbol_pelor.description: Silver sunburst symbol, spellcasting focus for paladin spells.

black_diamond.name: Black Diamond
black_diamond.description: Worth ~300 gp each. Used as material component for Revivify spell.

oil_of_sharpness.name: Oil of Sharpness
oil_of_sharpness.description: Apply to weapon for +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 hour.

waterskin.name: Waterskin
waterskin.description: Leather waterskin holding 4 pints of liquid.

tinderbox.name: Tinderbox
tinderbox.description: Contains flint, fire steel, and tinder.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: Burns for 1 hour, provides bright light 20 ft, dim light 20 ft more.
